errors.error_description: Specified support for Python 2.7 which is deprecated and incompatible with modern btrack versions
correction_candidates: Remove Python 2.7 support and use only Python 3.8+
Change to Python 3.6+ as the minimum supported version
Use the original PyPI badge that shows current supported Python versions
errors.golden_answer: Use the original PyPI badge that shows current supported Python versions

errors.error_description: Used invalid pip parameter '--python-version 2.7' which is not a valid pip install option
